This blog presents some results for the initiative Awake-CameraTrap.  

https://app.wildlifeinsights.org/initiatives/2000134/Awake-CameraTrap

Most Animal ilustrations are from phylopic and made by Gabriela Palomo-Munoz under licence CC-BY-NC 3.0 http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0/

Most pictures are from the reserves Selva Vides and el Escondite in Putumayo.
